summary: Six high school kids come face to face with an evil entity as they serve their detention before the town scarecrow festival.
cast: Lacey Chabert|Robin Dunne|Nicole Muñoz|Brittney Wilson|Carlo Marks|Reilly Dolman|Iain Belcher|Richard Harmon|Julia Maxwell|Kevin O'Grady|Jerry Wasserman|Lanie McAuley|Keenan Tracey
title: La maldición del espantapájaros
